ValidationRule.description: Sales team cannot move the stage backwards from "Ready to Ship" or "Closed Won". Order can move only via admin, finance or operations team.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( (ISPICKVAL(Type, "Rebate")), ISCHANGED( StageName ), (PRIORVALUE(Probability)> 0.90), NOT( OR( ($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), (CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Finance")), ($Profile.Name="Order Operations Admin"), ($Permission.Finance_Contractor )
) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move the opportunity backwards from Finance Processing. Only Finance, Operations and Admins can move Opportunity stages backwards.
